UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification and screening of potent antimicrobial peptides in arthropod genomes.
Literature.Author: Duwadi D, Shrestha A, Yilma B, Kozlovski I, Sa-Eed M, Dahal N, Jukosky J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=4.9±2.3µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>200µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=131.3±46.1µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=7±0.8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=16.2±1.9µg/ml)
